translation.Message_0_Page_0: You see here the operations of Nulirane Research are classified.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We must do what's necessary to ensure the survival of the human race.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Even if that means we must sacrifice some human lives to save the rest of our species.
translation.Response_0: That's absurd! You can't just do this!
translation.Response_1: I understand and I will be on my way. Sorry for bothering your research.
